hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas that some meat was brought to the Messenger of Allah and he said:"What is this?" It was said: "It was given in charity to Barirah." He said: "It is charity for her and a gift for us

chapter.ara-name: باب عَطِيَّةِ الْمَرْأَةِ بِغَيْرِ إِذْنِ زَوْجِهَا .
chapter.eng-name: A Woman Giving A Gift Without Her Husband's Permission
